summary: Completed testing of List SIJ feature for RAJA Digital System v1.0. All 28 backend tests passed (100%). All List SIJ features working correctly: (1) Page accessible from sidebar for both Admin and SuperAdmin (2) Search by driver name filters correctly (3) Date filter with calendar works (4) Detail modal shows all SIJ information (5) Cetak Browser and ESC/POS download buttons work (6) Pagination works correctly (14 pages, navigation confirmed).

fixed_issues.issue: Nested button inside button causing HTML validation warning
fixed_issues.fix: Moved the clear date button outside the popover trigger button

critical_code_review_comments: Framer Motion motion.tr in tbody causing hydration warnings in AdminDashboard and SuperAdminDashboard (existing issue from previous iteration, LOW priority)
context_for_next_testing_agent: List SIJ feature fully tested and working. Features verified: (1) Admin & SuperAdmin can access /sij-list route via sidebar 'List SIJ' menu item (2) Search by driver name filters table (e.g., typing 'Ahmad' shows 5 results for Ahmad Rizki) (3) Date filter opens calendar picker, selecting date filters results (4) Detail modal opens on clicking 'Detail' button, shows Transaction ID, Driver (name+ID), Tanggal, Waktu, Admin (name+shift), Jumlah Sheet, Status badge, QRIS Reference, Total Pembayaran (5) Cetak Browser opens print preview, ESC/POS downloads .bin file (6) Pagination shows 'Halaman X dari 14' with working prev/next buttons. All backend API tests pass including new tests for GET /api/sij with date filter and include_void parameter.

tested_features.list_sij_menu_admin: PASS - List SIJ visible in Admin sidebar
tested_features.list_sij_menu_superadmin: PASS - List SIJ visible in SuperAdmin sidebar
tested_features.list_sij_table: PASS - Table displays Transaction ID, Driver, Tanggal, Jam, Admin, Sheet, Status, Aksi columns
tested_features.search_by_driver_name: PASS - Typing 'Ahmad' filters to 5 results for Ahmad Rizki
tested_features.date_filter: PASS - Calendar opens, selecting date filters results
tested_features.detail_modal_open: PASS - Clicking Detail button opens modal
tested_features.detail_modal_fields: PASS - Shows all required fields (Transaction ID, Driver, Date, Time, Admin, Sheet, Status, QRIS, Amount)
tested_features.pagination: PASS - Shows 'Halaman 1 dari 14', next/prev buttons work
tested_features.api_get_sij: PASS - Returns list of active transactions
tested_features.api_get_sij_include_void: PASS - Returns void transactions when include_void=true
